cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Dec 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Dec 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Comfortable room with 1 Queen bed and shared bathrooms (6 bathrooms shared amongst 7 rooms). Good for 2 persons. Access to common area Kitchenette with toasters, microwaves and kettles.
We offer a 15% discount on food and beverage for all inhouse guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Comfortable room with Queen Bed and a private ensuite. Good for couples seeking privacy. Access to common area Kitchenette with toasters, microwaves and kettles. 
We offer a 15% discount on food and beverage for all  inhouse guests

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
